description: Parse indented tree text into structured TreeNode hierarchy
steps: Step 1: Open SitemapEditor with sample tree text
Step 2: Verify tree is parsed and displayed in visual preview
Step 3: Modify tree text with different indentation levels
Step 4: Verify tree structure updates correctly with new indentation
Step 5: Verify tree hierarchy reflects parent-child relationships correctly
Step 1: Render BasicTree with sample TreeNode data
Step 2: Verify all nodes are displayed in hierarchical order
Step 3: Verify indentation reflects tree depth
Step 4: Verify bullet points/tree connectors are displayed
Step 5: Verify component is responsive on different screen sizes
Step 1: Open SitemapEditor component

Step 2: Verify error detection identifies the issue
Step 3: Verify error message is displayed to user

Step 5: Fix the error and verify error message disappears

Step 3: Verify focus moves to next sibling or first child
Step 4: Use up arrow to navigate to previous node
Step 5: Verify focus moves to previous sibling or parent
Step 6: Use right/left arrows to expand/collapse nodes
Step 7: Verify node expansion/collapse behavior

Step 4: Modify the node label text

description: Export tree as SVG vector graphics
steps: Step 1: Display tree with ExportButton component

description: Save and restore tree versions with VersionManager
steps: Step 1: Create a tree structure in SitemapEditor
Step 2: Click save button in VersionManager
Step 3: Provide version name and confirm save
Step 4: Modify tree structure
Step 5: Click load and select previously saved version
Step 6: Verify tree is restored to saved state
Step 7: Verify version list shows all saved versions

description: Compare two tree versions with DiffViewer
steps: Step 1: Create two different tree structures
Step 2: Load both trees into DiffViewer component
Step 3: Verify both trees are displayed side-by-side
Step 4: Verify added nodes are highlighted in green
Step 5: Verify removed nodes are highlighted in red
Step 6: Verify modified nodes are highlighted in yellow
Step 7: Verify diff summary shows number of changes

description: Tree comparison identifies all change types
steps: Step 1: Create tree A with 5 nodes
Step 2: Create tree B with modifications (add, remove, modify nodes)

Step 4: Verify result includes added nodes
Step 5: Verify result includes removed nodes
